details.overview: Suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - eg removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public place or building
details.more_information:
To suggest a project, you'll need to give:

- your contact details
- a specific location of the where the work could be carried out
- a description of what needs to be done

Once the form is completed, your local Probation Trust will contact you to let you know if your suggestion has been accepted.
details.introduction: You can suggest a Community Payback project that would benefit your area - for example, removing graffiti and litter, clearing wasteland or decorating a public building.

details.description: Including criminal injuries compensation and reporting suspected crimes

tags.title: Safety and the environment in your community

details.description: Includes waste, rubbish and recycling, noise pollution and local emergencies
Your legal obligations and rights when renting, buying or owning a home, plus information about Council Tax, what to do if you're homeless and where to get help if you have a housing dispute.
